name.description: Unique identifier for the Content Block in the format vendor/content-block-name

title.description: The title of the Content Block

description.description: The description of the Content Block

group.description: Group name the Content Block should be displayed in

table.description: Defines the table name for the database.

typeName.description: This identifier distinguishes this Content Block from other types in the same table. Also known as record type.

prefixFields.description: Field identifiers will be prefixed with the Content Block name.

prefixType.description: Determines how to prefix the field if prefixFields is enabled.

priority.description: The priority can be used to prioritize certain Content Blocks in the loading order. The higher the value, the higher the priority.

basics.description: Basics contain a set of fields, which are appended after the fields definition.

saveAndClose.description: New Content Elements will skip the edit view.

fields.description: The root fields definition of the Content Block. Define your field types here.
